title: Integrity and confidentiality
description: Data must be processed securely to prevent unauthorized processing and accidental loss.

title: Security of processing
description: Appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk.

title: Transparent information
description: Provide information to data subjects in a concise, intelligible and accessible form.

title: Controller identity and contact
description: Identify the controller and provide contact details.

title: Recipients of personal data
description: Indicate recipients or categories of recipients of personal data.

title: Notice obligations
description: Data fiduciaries must give notice to data principals.

title: Reasonable security safeguards
description: Ensure protection of personal data against breaches.

title: Security audits
description: Conduct periodic technical and compliance audits.

title: Non-text Content
description: Provide text alternatives for non-text content.

title: Keyboard
description: All functionality is operable through a keyboard interface.

title: Name, Role, Value
description: For all user interface components, the name and role can be programmatically determined.

title: Contrast (Minimum)
description: Text must have sufficient contrast ratio.
